backend/main.mo: Actor defines student profiles, courses, announcements, and new site settings with admin‑restricted CRUD operations and authorization checks.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module upgrades stored state by adding default siteSettings while preserving existing data maps and counters.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and requirement IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file containing short summaries of major frontend components, hooks, and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variables defining color tokens and dark mode variants using OKLCH values.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file loading the React app entry point and setting initial document metadata.
frontend/README.md: Frontend documentation describing features, setup instructions, and development workflow.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app router and layout configuration with protected routes, authentication checks, and conditional profile setup modal.
frontend/src/components/admin/Announceme: Dialog form for creating and editing announcements with validation, default date logic, and React Query mutations.
Displays a list of announcements with edit/delete actions and handles confirmation dialogs and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/CourseEdit: Form dialog for creating or editing a course, handling validation and create/update mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/CourseList: Shows all courses in cards with edit/delete options, invoking CourseEditor and delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/admin/SiteSettin: Manages site settings including contact details and logo upload with validation and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/StudentEdi: Dialog for editing a student's profile with validation and update mutation support.
frontend/src/components/admin/StudentLis: Displays all student profiles in a table with edit actions and handles loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppHeader: Renders the app header with logo, user role, profile menu, and logout handling.
frontend/src/components/profile/ProfileS: Provides a modal form for creating a student profile with validation and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to the user’s identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, exposing login, logout, and identity state management.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogoObjectUrl.ts: Converts logo byte data into an object URL and handles cleanup on updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating student profiles, roles, courses, and announcements via the actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light and dark theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/AccessDenied.tsx: Displays an access-denied message with login prompts and navigation back to home.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboard.tsx: Renders the admin dashboard with course, announcement, student, and settings management tabs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDiagnostics.tsx: Shows authentication, role, and admin permission diagnostics for the current user.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Public landing page showing site info, courses, announcements, logo, and login/dashboard options.
frontend/src/pages/StudentDashboard.tsx: Displays a student's profile, courses, and announcements in a tabbed dashboard view.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers for reading URL params (including hash routing), storing them in sessionStorage, and retrieving or clearing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theming, colors, animations, and plugins for the frontend.
project_state.json: Project state file describing requirements, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the JK Tuition Center website.
